tr.td: schemaTypeMappingsUri
URI specifying the specific mappings from model types to WSDL Schema types. (i.e. file:${basedir}/XmlSchemaMappings.xml)
Yes
wsdlSoapAddress

Defines the location of the WSDL once the application is deployed (i.e. http://localhost:8080/security-service/services). The service name will be appended to the location to create the complete URL. For example if you have a service named SecurityService within your model, the entire URL to that service in the generated WSDL would be <wsdlsoap:address location="http://localhost:8080/security-service/services/SecurityService"/> within the <wsdl:service/> element.
Yes
schemaTypeMappingsUri
URI specifying the specific mappings from model types to WSDL Schema types. (i.e. file:${basedir}/XmlSchemaMappings.xml)
Yes (unless ignore is specified as true)
webservice-wsdl-outlet
Specifies the directory to which generated WSDL's will be placed.
Yes (unless ignore is specified as true)
webservice-java-outlet
The directory to which any non implementation Java files will be generated.
Yes (unless ignore is specified as true)
webservice-axis-outlet
The directory to which any AXIS specific files are generated (such as the WSDD files, etc).
Yes (unless ignore is specified as true)
webservice-axis-test-outlet
The directory to which AXIS specific tests are generated.
Yes (unless ignore is specified as true)
